title: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Wide Shade 4/9-13 for TIG MIG ARC Weld Hood Helmet
descriptions:
Introducing the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, specially designed for easy use and accessibility for elderly folks who may be easily confused. This advanced welding helmet is perfect for various processes including TIG, MIG, and MMA.

Featuring a wide viewing size of 3.64 inches in width and 1.67 inches in height, this helmet provides you with a clear and unobstructed view of your work. With 2 sensors and a switch speed of 1/30000 second, you can trust that the helmet will automatically darken and protect your eyes from harmful welding arcs.

The optical clarity of this helmet is unmatched, rated at 1/1/1/1, ensuring that you can see your work with exceptional clarity and detail. Plus, with compatibility for Cheater Lens and Magnifying Lens, you can easily enhance your vision for precise work.

The YESWELDER welding helmet is powered by solar energy, providing you with an increased battery life. No need to worry about constantly changing batteries, this helmet has got you covered.

But that's not all, this helmet also offers superior comfort with its pivot style headgear. Designed to fit securely and comfortably, you can work for extended periods without any discomfort.

With a shade range of 4 to 13, you can adjust the darkness level according to your preference and welding needs.

Don't miss out on this amazing welding helmet that combines advanced features, easy accessibility, and top-notch comfort. Upgrade your welding experience with the YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet today.
